detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#6)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#10)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#68-70)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#16)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#43-54)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#72-76)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#29)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#78-80)
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#34)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- DraculaFinance.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DraculaFinance.sol#90-93)
